tag_list: swipp, jajah, talenthouse, vm-poeple, frederik, hermann, international-communications, social-media, public-relations, marketing, word-of-mouth, viral-marketing, social-network-analysis, brand-development, netzkobold, product-marketing
overview:
Accomplished, results-driven executive with extensive experience in innovative technology startups. Develop and execute high-quality strategic plans focused on marketing, advertising, PR, social media, SEO, and word-of-mouth marketing. Collaborate effectively with executive leadership and lead global cross-functional teams to meet key business objectives and grow revenue. Develop relationships with key journalists and online influencers in major outlets. Oversee product launches and develop effective partner and channel marketing strategies. Manage relationships with outside agencies and complete complex competitive analysis. Possess expertise in social media strategies and supervise website design. Develop online and print collateral and design and optimize marketing campaigns. Dynamic, highly-motivated leader with expertise in online strategies and commitment to meeting marketing goals.

Specialties: International Communications, Social Media, Online Marketing, Brand Development, PR, Strategic Planning, Product Design, Community Engagement, Word-of-Mouth Marketing, Internet Strategy, Viral Marketing, SEO, Advertising, Social Network Analysis, Event Management, Trade Shows, SEO, Digital Strategy, Message Development, Media Relations, Search Advertising, Digital Innovation, Online Lead Generation, Buzz Marketing, Global Media Relations, Strategic Planning, Channel Marketing, Product Marketing.
